item.description:
We'll see the newly released movie "Wild Hogs" starring John Travolta, Tim Allen, Martin Lawrence, and William H. Macy.

Go to the website WildHogsMovie.com to see the trailer and play the game "Burn Rubber Now."

The movie is playing at 7:15 pm

If you can make it earlier, let's meet at John Harvard's Brew House in Manchester (down the street from the cinema) for drinks and appetizers at 5:30 pm before the movie.
If not, then meet us in the lobby of the movie theater at 6:45 pm to get tickets.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Go Hog Wild at the Movies-7:15 pm and Brew before- (5:30ish)
